body: I know people are going to come to this comment section to complain about loli. So in advance, could you losers shut the fuck up for once in your miserable lives? Why do dumb fucks read loli just to complain about it, you must have a sad life if you intentionally seek out things to complain about. I’m not a pedo either, I’m just telling the truth.
